div.span: Pharmacy Clinical Strategies Trend and Drug Pipeline Leader

p.style: MARGIN: 12pt 0in 6pt
p.span: Pharmacy Clinical Strategies Trend and Drug Pipeline Leader

p.style: MARGIN: 12pt 0in 6pt

span.span: Reports to Director, Pharmacy Clinical Strategies

p.style: MARGIN: 12pt 0in 6pt
MARGIN: 12pt 0in 6pt
MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt

span.font: Be a part of an interactive team with broad exposure and scope within Humana. Humana is seeking a manager to oversee a dynamic team that helps translate the clinical into financial to ensure Humana profitability.

p.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt

li.style: COLOR: black; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo2; tab-stops: list .5in
li.span: Utilizes broad understanding of managed care and PBMs to develop strategies to mitigate Humana’s cost and trend while improving our member’s health and costs

li.style: COLOR: black; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo2; tab-stops: list .5in
li.span: Leads our clinical drug trend and pipeline processes

li.style: COLOR: black; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo2; tab-stops: list .5in
li.span: Monitors relevant publicly available news/developments in the pharmaceutical sector to direct relevant drug pipeline and trend investigations

p.style: MARGIN: 1em 0px 1em 0.5in; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo2; tab-stops: list .5in; mso-add-space: auto

font.font: Oversees our generic drug and biosimilar therapeutics pipeline processes, including oversight of modeling and tracking the generic dispense rate (GDR) across all lines of business

p.style: MARGIN: 1em 0px 1em 0.5in; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo2; tab-stops: list .5in; mso-add-space: auto

font.font: Develop corporate communications of high quality to be shared with senior leadership such drug pipeline updates and market event notifications

li.style: COLOR: black; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo2; tab-stops: list .5in
li.span: Partners with pharmacists, business professionals and actuaries in a team environment

li.style: COLOR: black; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-margin-top-alt: auto; mso-margin-bottom-alt: auto; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo2; tab-stops: list .5in
li.span: Presents confidently to senior leadership on key metrics including potential drug pipeline impacts

p.style: MARGIN: 1em 0in 1em 0.5in; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo2; tab-stops: list .5in; mso-add-space: auto

font.font: Supports clinical research integration activities with internal research department

li.style: COLOR: black; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo2; tab-stops: list .5in; mso-layout-grid-align: none

span.font: Participates in Humana Pharmacy committees as appropriate

li.style: MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo1

font.font: An understanding of financial analysis and equity research

div.span: Humana Inc., headquartered in Louisville, Ky., is a leading health care company that offers a wide range of insurance products and health and wellness services that incorporate an integrated approach to lifelong well-being. By leveraging the strengths of its core businesses, Humana believes it can better explore opportunities for existing and emerging adjacencies in health care that can further enhance wellness opportunities for the millions of people across the nation with whom the company has relationships.
